title: IRCTC Notification 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 64 Hospitality Monito Posts
description: Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) has released the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 64 Hospitality Monitor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, MBA can grab this chance and apply for the IRCTC Notification 2025 . Here, we mentioned information like the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in ...
